<class name="TridiagonalDecomposition" extends="InPlaceDecomposition" startLine="41"> <implements name="Tridiagonal" />
* You create instances of (some subclass of) this class by calling one of the static factory methods:{@linkplain #makeBig()}, {@linkplain #makeComplex()} or {@linkplain #makePrimitive()}. apete

superDiagonal should be the conjugate of this but it is set to the saem value

<declaration type="Access2D" name="aTriangularMtrx" /> <declaration type="DecompositionStore" name="tmpInPlace" /> <declaration type="Householder" name="tmpHouseholder" />
<declaration type="Array2D" name="tmpArray2D" /> <declaration type="Array1D" name="tmpMain" /> <declaration type="Array1D" name="tmpSub" /> Which is also the col-dim. Super differs only in possible conjugate values
